title: General
fullText:
Notification of critical defects shall be provided before leaving the site or, where this cannot be achieved, as soon as possible. Critical defects shall be confirmed in writing within 24 hours of the defect identification and reconfirmed each time the defect is identified.
This confirmation in writing may be in the form of the service and maintenance records as per Clause 2.7 but shall be provided within 24 hours.
